attributes.action: To keep the Rule Britannia song in the Night of the Proms
attributes.additional_details: I am a veteran and patriotic. I served and fought for my country not to see it torn apart
attributes.background: Keep the songs in the repositories of the Night of the Proms. Override the BBC

rejection.details:
Decisions about the BBC Proms are a matter for BBC, which is operationally independent, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can read the BBC's announcement of the programme for the Last Night of the Proms here: https://www.pressparty.com/pg/newsdesk/BBC1/view/223541/
